hero.headline: Our Story
hero.subheadline: Building the future of web hosting, one website at a time.

story.mission: At HostWP, we believe every website deserves lightning-fast performance and rock-solid reliability. Founded by hosting experts who were frustrated with slow, unreliable hosting providers, we set out to create something better.

timeline.title: The Beginning

timeline.title: Global Expansion
